Class Vehicle

  • java.lang.Object
    • Sprite
      • Vehicle
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Bike, Bulldozer, Bus, Log, LongLog, Racecar, Turtle
    public abstract class Vehicle
extends Sprite
    Abstract class that represents a basic moving Sprite that obstructs the player.

      • Vehicle

        public Vehicle​(java.lang.String imageSrc,
               float x,
               float y,
               boolean moveRight,
               java.lang.String[] tags)
        Basic constructor for any Vehicle
        Parameters:
        imageSrc - Image that will be rendered
        x - X position of the vehicle
        y - Y position of the vehicle
        moveRight - Direction of movement of the Vehicle
        tags - Predefined tags that determine the behaviour of a Vehicle
